item.title: Referencing with zotero and other tools
item.description: 2022-02-23 cool zotero tools GitHub - avram/zandy: Zotero on Android GitHub - ethanwillis/zotero-scihub: A plugin that will automatically download PDFs of zotero items from sci-hub GitHub - bwiernik/zotero-tools: A collection of tools for use with the Zotero reference management software GitHub - jbaiter/zotero-cli: Command-line interface for Zotero GitHub - egh/zotxt: zotxt: a Zotero extension for text 2021-12-06 WORKFLOW WITH ZOTERO & GOOGLE DOCS/WORD : zotero prefs -> export -> harvard 2021-12-06 WORKFLOW WITH ZOTERO AND LATEX PREFERENCES SETTING HTML OPENER : XDG MIME QUERY FOR HTML FILES AND XDG-MIME DEFAULT FOR HTML FILES
